title: Syndra lagging the game -
body:
Whenever I'm in a game with or against a Syndra, her E always lags my game.  There's a noticeable change in ping.  It's happened for a few months now, and it's consistent among all of her skins.

Any idea why this would happen?

replies.body: I haven't seen any other reports about this, so it's likely caused by something local to your PC. So you see changes in your latency (ping) rather than changes in your framerate (FPS) when she uses her E?

Yeah, I figured it was my computer.  Just weird.  But yeah, Ping gets hit, not FPS.  Doesn't make sense.  It spikes from 60-ms to about 130-ms.  

It's a minor enough glitch, and outside of URF it's not very impactful.  Still, interesting.

To ensure there isn't an issue with one or more of your local network settings, I'd like you to work through the steps outlined in our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) in their entirety.

If this doesn't cause any change to your symptoms in-game, let me know so we can further troubleshoot this together. ^.^
no i desagree i play syndra with one of her skins and i'm not lagging its may be your computer wich don't have enought power
